data.name: Exception_FormatNotDetermined
data.value: Could not determine the formatting of the message.

data.name: Exception_MalformedDatabase
data.value: The file upload was not in the correct SQLite file format.

data.name: Exception_MalformedUpload
data.value: The file uploaded is missing or was malformed.

data.name: Exception_PropertySelectorResolutionError
data.value: The property selector was unable to resolve to a property name.

data.name: Logger_DeliveryStatusDetected
data.value: Message is a multipart message with at least one 'delivery-status' section.

data.name: Logger_DisposingWrapper
data.value: Disposing of the client wrapper object.

data.name: Logger_EmailDefinitionFetchFailure
data.value: Unable to fetch email definition from queue.

data.name: Logger_EmailDefinitionFound
data.value: Found an email definition in the shared memory queue.

data.name: Logger_FailureDetectedUnknownRecipient
data.value: The bounced email contains a failure report, but an unknown recipient status group.

data.name: Logger_Format_AddressNotActive
data.value: The email address for {0} appears to no longer be active.

data.name: Logger_Format_CouldNotFindContact
data.value: Could not find contact with ID = {0}.

data.name: Logger_Format_CouldNotFindDiscussionList
data.value: Could not find discussion list with ID = {0}

data.name: Logger_Format_DBNotCreated
data.value: Could not create database file at {0}.

data.name: Logger_Format_FormInputMalformed
data.value: Form input was malformed or missing for {0}.

data.name: Logger_Format_InvalidUnsubscriptionContact
data.value: Invalid unsubscription request for non-existant contact with ID {0}.

data.name: Logger_Format_InvalidUnsubscriptionDiscussionList
data.value: Invalid unsubscription request for non-existant discussion list with ID {0}.

data.name: Logger_Format_InvalidUnsubscriptionSubscriptionStatus
data.value: Invalid unsubscription status for contact with ID {0} and discussion list {1} due to subscription status {2}.

data.name: Logger_Format_MessageProcessed
data.value: Message {0} (Index {1}) processed. Marked for deletion from the server.

data.name: Logger_Format_SendingOwnerNotification
data.value: Sending a notication to the discussion list owner that {0} ({1}) has requested access to {2}.

data.name: Logger_Format_SendingSubscriptionConfirmation
data.value: Sending the subscription confirmation email to {0} ({1}).

data.name: Logger_Format_SendingTest
data.value: Sending a test Owner Notification email to discussion list {0}.

data.name: Logger_Format_SendingUnsubscriptionConfirmation
data.value: Sending the subscription confirmation email to {0} ({1}).

data.name: Logger_Format_SettingActive
data.value: Setting {0} (ID {1}) as active. They have confirmed they control the email address by responding to the subscription confirmation email.

data.name: Logger_Format_UnknownUserRequestedAccess
data.value: An unknown user has requested access to {0}. An alert will be sent to the owner address alias.

data.name: Logger_Format_UnrecognizedOrUnauthorized
data.value: The sender is unrecognized or unauthorized to participate in {0}. We'll log it and let the message be deleted.

data.name: Logger_Format_UnsubscribedBounce
data.value: A bounced email was recieved for an address that is not subscribed to {0}. Ignoring this message.

data.name: Logger_Format_UserAlreadySubscribed
data.value: {0}, who is already subscribed to {1}, has requested access again. Ignoring this message.

data.name: Logger_Format_UserPreviouslyDenied
data.value: {0} has requested access to {1}, but has previously been denied. Ignoring this request.

data.name: Logger_Format_UserPreviouslySubscribed
data.value: {0} has requested access to {1}. Because they have previously be associated with the discussion list, they will be subscribed.

data.name: Logger_FoundResources
data.value: Found the following resource names in the assembly manifest:

data.name: Logger_InitializingSharedMemory
data.value: Initializing shared memory object via static constructor.

data.name: Logger_InvalidUnsubscriptionSubscription
data.value: Invalid unsubscription request. No subscription status found.

data.name: Logger_MessageContainsHTML
data.value: Mesasge body determined to contain HTML.

data.name: Logger_MessageContainsPlainText
data.value: Message body determined to contain plain text.

data.name: Logger_NoOnboardingAssignments
data.value: No freshly created assignments waiting for onboarding.

data.name: Logger_RequestOnExternalPort
data.value: The request is being processed from the designated external port. Request Origin: {0}

data.name: Logger_RequestOnInternalPort
data.value: The request is being processed from the designated internal port.

data.name: Logger_RequestOnUnknownPort
data.value: The request is being processed from an unknown port ({0})). The docker container is likely misconfigured. Remote Origin: {1}

data.name: Logger_SMTPNotConnected
data.value: The SMTP client is not connected. Connecting now.

data.name: Logger_UnknownClientType
data.value: An unknown client type was requested.

data.name: Mail_Format_HTMLUnsubscribeEmailMessage
data.value: This message is part of the '{0}' discussion list. You can unsubscribe by sending any message to {1}

data.name: Mail_Format_HTMLUnsubscribeLinkMessage
data.value: This message is part of the '{0}' discussion list. You can unsubscribe by clicking here: {1}

data.name: Mail_Format_OnboardingBody
data.value: The '{0}' email list administator has invited you to participate. To confirm your subscription, simply reply to this e-mail. If you do not wish to participate, you can ignore this email.

data.name: Mail_Format_OnboardingSubheading
data.value: You've been invited to the '{0}' Email Discussion List

data.name: Mail_Format_OwnerNotificationSubheading
data.value: {0} has requested access to the '{0}' Email Discussion List

data.name: Mail_Format_SubjectReplace
data.comment: It is important that this message mirrors Mail_Format_Subject with all characters after {0}, including the first space.

data.name: Mail_Format_SubscriptionConfirmationBody
data.value: Glad to have you. To send a message to everyone on the discussion list, just send an email to {0}. When you recieve a message from someone in the group, you can simply reply to that email and everyone on the discussion list will get a copy.

data.name: Mail_Format_SubscriptionConfirmationSubheading
data.value: You've been subscribed to the '{0}' Email Discussion List

data.name: Mail_Format_TextUnsubscribeEmailMessage
data.value: This message is part of the '{0}' discussion list. You can unsubscribe by sending any message to {1}.

data.name: Mail_Format_TextUnsubscribeLinkMessage
data.value: This message is part of the '{0}' discussion list. You can unsubscribe by clicking here: {1}

data.name: Mail_Format_UnsubscriptionConfirmationBody
data.value: You have successfully unsubscribed from this discussion list. If you'd ever like to resubscribe, send a message to {0}.

data.name: Mail_Format_UnsubscriptionConfirmationSubheading
data.value: You will no longer recieve messages from the '{0}' Email Discussion List

data.name: Mail_OwnerNotificationBody
data.value: Please visit the the web administration interface to process this request.
